keybinding-header.description: Switch focus to adjacent window hotkeys

include-other-monitors.description: Allow switching to windows on other monitors

next-focus.tooltip: In the set of windows matching the direction hotkey used, active the window that is ether highest in the z-order (most recently focused) or the window closest to the current window. Activating the closest window might bring a window that is currently completely obscured by another window in to focus, but activating the highest window in the z-order might skip over a visible window that is closer to the current window.
